How to get P, Q and R to make the public keys N1, N2 and N3?

A = P*Q = N1
B = Q*R = N2
C = P*R = N3

We need to manipulate the equations making substituitions between the variables

1) P = A / Q
2) C = (A / Q) * R
3) Q = B / R

Replacing 3 em 2 and doing the algebric maipulation:
C = (A / (B / R)) * R =>
C = (A / 1) * (R / B) * R =>
C = A * R * R / B =>
B*C = A * R * R =>
R*R = (B * C) / A =>
R = sqrt((B * C) / A) =>
R = sqrt((N2 * N3) / A)

R = sqrt(Z2)
